text: Máximo Luis Alcócer (15 April 1933 - 13 May 2014) was a Bolivian footballer whose career lasted for almost ten years. His career began in 1954. He retired in 1963. Alcócer played for Club Union Maestranza and Club Aurora. Alcócer was born in Cochabamba, Bolivia. Alcócer died in North Carolina, United States, aged 81. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Bolivian footballers
title: Máximo Alcócer
